SmartCert is a decentralized application that allows corporations to issue certifications and individuals to provably display those certifications.

Motivation

Upon receiving a certification (from Amazon for example), the burden of proof lies with whomever is trying to verify that you hold that certification. A respective employer would need to contact Amazon and provide the number associated with your certifaction to verify that you actually received it.

SmartCert utilizes the blockchain to make this process trust-less. The certifismartcations are distributed from an issuers address to a holders address. Verification then becomes as simple as signing a message to prove ownership of the address holding the certification.

Stack

It uses the following tech:

  • React/Redux
  • Solidity (Ethereum)
  • Truffle
  • Drizzle
